text: The Canet guns were designed by Gustave Canet (1846-1913) for Schneider et Cie. ==Naval artillery== Schneider was successful in sales to the Empire of Japan. The guns supplied to Japan equipped the cruisers , , and . NavWeaps, "Japanese 12.6"/38 (32 cm) Canet"; retrieved 2012-2-21. The guns were used during the First Sino-Japanese War. ==Related pages == * Artillery of Japan ==References == ==Other websites== Category:Military of Japan Category:Artillery
title: Canet gun
